game_consoles.name: PlayMaster X1
game_consoles.description: A next-gen gaming console with ultra-fast load times, 4K gaming support, and a vast library of exclusive titles for immersive experiences.

game_consoles.name: ArcadePro 5000
game_consoles.description: A retro-inspired console that lets players enjoy classic arcade games with modern enhancements like online leaderboards and multiplayer support.

game_consoles.name: InfinityStation 4K
game_consoles.description: An all-in-one entertainment system offering 4K resolution, VR compatibility, and access to streaming services, making it perfect for both gamers and media enthusiasts.

game_consoles.name: ThunderBox Mini
game_consoles.description: A compact portable console designed for on-the-go gaming, featuring cloud storage and an extensive library of indie games and casual titles.

game_consoles.name: NeoCube Pro
game_consoles.description: A powerful hybrid console that blends handheld and home gaming, allowing seamless switching between console mode and portable play with a robust game catalog.

game_consoles.name: X-Play 300
game_consoles.description: A budget-friendly console with great performance for casual gamers, featuring a selection of popular titles and easy-to-use family-friendly controls.
